title: Best of The Herd for Apr 09, 2020
itunes:title: Best of The Herd for Apr 09, 2020
description:
Colin disputes the notion that you can't draft Tua because of injuries

LeBron's legacy with the younger audience will be hurt by MJ documentary

LeBron's window to win a title might close if NBA season is cancelled 


Guest: Mike Krzyzewski, Duke Head Coach

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
